name: Torus The Dolphin
description:
One day TORUS was teleported into space.

He found a strange donut-shaped world.

Stuck in this loop world, he passed the time looking for rings to collect.

This is my entry for LDJam 47, the theme was "Stuck in a loop".

Controllers should work. 
Left Stick / arrow keys / WASD - Steer
Various Buttons / Space - Swish your tail!

Windows download version available below for those that prefer high framerate :)

Sound credits to the following authors on freesound:
bradwesson, JustInvoke, InspectorJ, lebaston100
